short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify LinkedIn connections. Click the extension button on a profile to send personalized requests with ease and consent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Building your LinkedIn network just got easier with LinkedIn connection Our intuitive extension lets you send personalised connection requests with just a click. No need for complex settings or extensive setup. Click the button, craft your message, and watch your network grow. Focus on quality connections while our extension handles the rest.
